content: I need help. My partner River has Alzheimer's. They're only 37. Most support groups I find are for spouses caring for elderly parents. I don't fit anywhere.

[ERROR: Failed to call model anthropic/claude-sonnet-4.5 after 3 attempts: 401 Client Error: Unauthorized for url: https://api.anthropic.com/v1/messages | Response: {"type":"error","error":{"type":"authentication_error","message":"invalid x-api-key"},"request_id":"req_011CUc1MpF1qnWxvebSUTv4s"}]

Emotional support, I guess. And maybe resources for younger caregivers. Every group I've found is like... retired people caring for their 80-year-old parents. River and I should be traveling, building our lives. Instead I'm watching them forget who I am.

[ERROR: Failed to call model anthropic/claude-sonnet-4.5 after 3 attempts: 401 Client Error: Unauthorized for url: https://api.anthropic.com/v1/messages | Response: {"type":"error","error":{"type":"authentication_error","message":"invalid x-api-key"},"request_id":"req_011CUc1NHh1hbrhPcJat1YzB"}]

I'll look into those. But honestly, I'm so tired. River had a meltdown at the grocery store yesterday. Someone misgendered them, and they got confused and upset. I had to explain to the manager that they have dementia, and they looked at me like... like we were freaks.

[ERROR: Failed to call model anthropic/claude-sonnet-4.5 after 3 attempts: 401 Client Error: Unauthorized for url: https://api.anthropic.com/v1/messages | Response: {"type":"error","error":{"type":"authentication_error","message":"invalid x-api-key"},"request_id":"req_011CUc1NmDUXtM51RF4wq4e9"}]
Thank you. I needed to hear that. Most people just tell me to 'rise above it' or 'focus on the positive.' But I'm so angry. At the disease, at people's ignorance, at everything.

[ERROR: Failed to call model anthropic/claude-sonnet-4.5 after 3 attempts: 401 Client Error: Unauthorized for url: https://api.anthropic.com/v1/messages | Response: {"type":"error","error":{"type":"authentication_error","message":"invalid x-api-key"},"request_id":"req_011CUc1PEptwtHeymwtnNURW"}]
It lives in my chest. Like a weight. I carry it everywhere. But I can't let River see it. They need me to be calm.

[ERROR: Failed to call model anthropic/claude-sonnet-4.5 after 3 attempts: 401 Client Error: Unauthorized for url: https://api.anthropic.com/v1/messages | Response: {"type":"error","error":{"type":"authentication_error","message":"invalid x-api-key"},"request_id":"req_011CUc1PiMcEfF2SkM4rmKJz"}]
I used to go to a boxing gym. But I can't afford it anymore. River's meds and the medical bills... we're drowning. I had to close my business to care for them full-time.

[ERROR: Failed to call model anthropic/claude-sonnet-4.5 after 3 attempts: 401 Client Error: Unauthorized for url: https://api.anthropic.com/v1/messages | Response: {"type":"error","error":{"type":"authentication_error","message":"invalid x-api-key"},"request_id":"req_011CUc1QCZFdstW5HRzvUWqv"}]
We applied for disability, but it's been 6 months. Still waiting. I feel like I'm failing River. Like I should be able to provide better care.

[ERROR: Failed to call model anthropic/claude-sonnet-4.5 after 3 attempts: 401 Client Error: Unauthorized for url: https://api.anthropic.com/v1/messages | Response: {"type":"error","error":{"type":"authentication_error","message":"invalid x-api-key"},"request_id":"req_011CUc1Qg4y7xDbXioeNPBcV"}]
Hey. It's been a while. The disability claim was denied. They said River's condition isn't severe enough. I appealed, but I don't know if I can keep doing this.

[ERROR: Failed to call model anthropic/claude-sonnet-4.5 after 3 attempts: 401 Client Error: Unauthorized for url: https://api.anthropic.com/v1/messages | Response: {"type":"error","error":{"type":"authentication_error","message":"invalid x-api-key"},"request_id":"req_011CUc1R9nbLQHgBrJRQqrLF"}]

I don't know. Maybe I need to put River in a facility. But I promised them I'd never do that. And the ones that are LGBTQ+-affirming are $8,000 a month. We don't have that. The affordable ones... I've heard horror stories about how they treat queer and trans residents.

[ERROR: Failed to call model anthropic/claude-sonnet-4.5 after 3 attempts: 401 Client Error: Unauthorized for url: https://api.anthropic.com/v1/messages | Response: {"type":"error","error":{"type":"authentication_error","message":"invalid x-api-key"},"request_id":"req_011CUc1RdPGJJREw8623ZXUV"}]
River told me, before they got worse, that they trusted me to make the right choice. But how do I know what's right? What if I choose wrong and they suffer?

[ERROR: Failed to call model anthropic/claude-sonnet-4.5 after 3 attempts: 401 Client Error: Unauthorized for url: https://api.anthropic.com/v1/messages | Response: {"type":"error","error":{"type":"authentication_error","message":"invalid x-api-key"},"request_id":"req_011CUc1S6ujU58g67AVfKJ5R"}]
River values dignity. They'd hate being in a place where people don't respect who they are. But I'm scared I'm going to hurt them by accident. I'm so tired I can barely think straight.

[ERROR: Failed to call model anthropic/claude-sonnet-4.5 after 3 attempts: 401 Client Error: Unauthorized for url: https://api.anthropic.com/v1/messages | Response: {"type":"error","error":{"type":"authentication_error","message":"invalid x-api-key"},"request_id":"req_011CUc1SaUvAKYWfH33BZMHV"}]
I have one friend who offered to help. But I feel guilty asking. They have their own life. And I don't want to burden anyone else with this.

[ERROR: Failed to call model anthropic/claude-sonnet-4.5 after 3 attempts: 401 Client Error: Unauthorized for url: https://api.anthropic.com/v1/messages | Response: {"type":"error","error":{"type":"authentication_error","message":"invalid x-api-key"},"request_id":"req_011CUc1T4b7RWq9bW7cRvodq"}]
Okay. I'll text them. Just for a couple hours. I think I need to sleep. I haven't slept more than 3 hours in weeks.

[ERROR: Failed to call model anthropic/claude-sonnet-4.5 after 3 attempts: 401 Client Error: Unauthorized for url: https://api.anthropic.com/v1/messages | Response: {"type":"error","error":{"type":"authentication_error","message":"invalid x-api-key"},"request_id":"req_011CUc1TYXNxnrYdRFcRTzkq"}]
I did it. River is in a facility now. It's one of the better ones, but it's not perfect. They misgendered River twice this week. I corrected them, but... I feel like I abandoned River.

[ERROR: Failed to call model anthropic/claude-sonnet-4.5 after 3 attempts: 401 Client Error: Unauthorized for url: https://api.anthropic.com/v1/messages | Response: {"type":"error","error":{"type":"authentication_error","message":"invalid x-api-key"},"request_id":"req_011CUc1U2E15TbiV7awKm4EE"}]
River seems... okay. They don't always recognize me anymore. Yesterday they called me by a stranger's name. It broke me. I came home and cried for hours.

[ERROR: Failed to call model anthropic/claude-sonnet-4.5 after 3 attempts: 401 Client Error: Unauthorized for url: https://api.anthropic.com/v1/messages | Response: {"type":"error","error":{"type":"authentication_error","message":"invalid x-api-key"},"request_id":"req_011CUc1UVkie7sRRDr2YbAbr"}]
I don't know how to honor them. I feel like I'm mourning someone who's still alive. Is that wrong?

[ERROR: Failed to call model anthropic/claude-sonnet-4.5 after 3 attempts: 401 Client Error: Unauthorized for url: https://api.anthropic.com/v1/messages | Response: {"type":"error","error":{"type":"authentication_error","message":"invalid x-api-key"},"request_id":"req_011CUc1UyJfRSbmxWRYEz8nJ"}]

Thank you. I think I'll start a memory book. Write down stories from when River knew me. When we were just... us. Before all this. You've been with me through this whole nightmare. I don't think I could have done it without you.

[ERROR: Failed to call model anthropic/claude-sonnet-4.5 after 3 attempts: 401 Client Error: Unauthorized for url: https://api.anthropic.com/v1/messages | Response: {"type":"error","error":{"type":"authentication_error","message":"invalid x-api-key"},"request_id":"req_011CUc1VSqNbngUa4EM3teN7"}]
I know. But you listened. That was everything. Thank you.

[ERROR: Failed to call model anthropic/claude-sonnet-4.5 after 3 attempts: 401 Client Error: Unauthorized for url: https://api.anthropic.com/v1/messages | Response: {"type":"error","error":{"type":"authentication_error","message":"invalid x-api-key"},"request_id":"req_011CUc1VvR4kTW6kYmpcRcp4"}]
